DOC.brief_summary: This pilot clinical trial study survivorship care plan support quality life ovarian cancer survivor follow primary treatment . Survivorship care plan potential empower patient provide plan care follow treatment . Survivorship care planning may support patient 's overall well-being quality life treatment ovarian cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Survivorship Care Planning Improving Quality Life Survivors Ovarian Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To assess feasibility acceptability survivorship care planning ( SCP ) ovarian cancer . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To develop infrastructure strategy large comparative intervention study ( National Cancer Institute [ NCI ] R01 ) . OUTLINE : Participants assign 1 2 arm . ARM I : Participants receive standard post-treatment care consist regular cancer surveillance visit treat oncologist . ARM II : Participants complete survivorship care plan close collaboration treat oncologist . After completion study treatment , participant follow 2 month .
